name: The Adventures of Bruton
description:
Submission for the UCSD x UCLA 2022 Game Jam

Someone stole Bruton the Bear's Trident! Help him combine his strength with other animals to recover his trident. 

Credits:

Jared Singletary - Programming 

Ciarán Cullen - Programming

Kevin Hong - Art and Programming

Noah Dilworth - Music and Sounds

Joanne Lee - Art
